Posts.EditableText: I can't access the member list!  At the top there used to be a link to the memberlist, but know it's gone!  Anyone got the same problem?
Posts.HTML: I can't access the member list!  At the top there used to be a link to the memberlist, but know it's gone!  Anyone got the same problem?

Posts.EditableText:
I removed it... what did you want it for?

It was filling up with automated registrations from spammers putting web links in their profiles in order to boost their Google ranking.
